message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper is about improving query expansion, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses WordNet, a lexical resource, to measure the usefulness of candidate expansion terms, which suggests that it may belong to the natural language processing (NLP) subfield, specifically computational linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper proposes a combination-based QE method that takes into account statistical association and semantic relations, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on various test collections, which may suggest that it belongs to the cybernetics (cs.CY) subfield, which deals with the study of communication and control in the animal and machine.
